00028     class GetValue {
00029     public:
00030         GetValue() { }
00031 
00032         GetValue(std::string v, bool s) {
00033             value = v;
00034             success = s;
00035         }
00036 
00037         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, GetValue &gv) {
00038             return o << "{GetValue success=" << gv.success
00039                      << ", value=\"" << gv.value << "\"}";
00040         }
00041 
00045         std::string value;
00049         bool success;
00050     };

00055     class ThingUnderTest {
00056     public:
00060         virtual void reset() {}
00061 
00067         virtual void noop(Callback<bool> &c) {
00068             bool t = true;
00069             c.callback(t);
00070         }
00071 
00079         virtual void set(std::string &key, std::string &val,
00080                          Callback<bool> &cb) = 0;
00081 
00088         virtual void get(std::string &key, Callback<GetValue> &cb) = 0;
00089 
00097         virtual void del(std::string &key, Callback<bool> &cb) = 0;
00098 
00099     };

00104     class AssertionError : public std::runtime_error {
00105     public:
00106         AssertionError(const char *s) : std::runtime_error(s) { }
00107         AssertionError(const std::string s) : std::runtime_error(s) { }
00108     };
00109 
00113     class Assertions {
00114     public:
00115         inline void assertTrue(bool v, std::string msg) {
00116             if(!v) {
00117                 throw AssertionError(msg);
00118             }
00119         }
00120 
00121         inline void assertFalse(bool v, std::string msg) {
00122             assertTrue(!v, msg);
00123         }
00124 
00125         inline void assertEquals(std::string s1, std::string s2) {
00126             assertTrue(s1.compare(s2) == 0, "failed string compare");
00127         }
00128 
00129         inline void assertEquals(int i1, int i2) {
00130             std::stringstream ss;
00131             ss << "Expected " << i1 << " got " << i2;
00132             assertTrue(i1 == i2, ss.str());
00133         }
00134 
00135         inline void assertNull(std::string *s) {
00136             if (s != NULL) {
00137                 std::string msg = "expected null, got ``" + *s + "''";
00138                 throw AssertionError(msg);
00139             }
00140         }
00141 
00142         inline void assertNotNull(std::string *s) {
00143             assertTrue(s != NULL, "expected nonnull");
00144         }
00145     };
00146 }
